CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1957, pg. 14 reads: "Pittsburgh Becomes Bridge Capital Of Nation as Experts Invade City For Twenty-fourth ABA Tournament!...will converge on the Steel City this Saturday for an Aug. 10-18 assault on the fascinating game...The affair, headquartered in downtown Fort Pitt Hotel..."
TitMainTitle: Two men, and two women, one wearing striped dress with polka dot lining, gathered around table playing bridge in Fort Pitt Hotel during 24th annual American Bridge Association tournament
